description: Kiwis lend sweetness to this veggie-packed vegan smoothie.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Plant-based,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Avocado,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Kiwi, Spinach & Avocado Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cup coconut milk, save 2 tsp for later (canned, reduced fat)

recipeInstructions.text: Add all of the ingredients to a high powered blender with two handfuls of ice and blitz until completely smooth, adding water if necessary.
